reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 477/00: DELEGATION OF MINISTER'S AUTHORITY - FRONTENAC MANAGEMENT BOARD
reg_info.reg_name_text: DELEGATION OF MINISTER’S AUTHORITY — FRONTENAC MANAGEMENT BOARD
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 477/00: DELEGATION OF MINISTER'S AUTHORITY - FRONTENAC MANAGEMENT BOARD
reg_info.act_under: Planning Act   Loi sur l’aménagement du territoire

content.content: 1. The authority of the Minister under the following provisions is delegated to the Frontenac Management Board with respect to all applications made on or after August 28, 2000 for land situate in the geographic area of the board: 1. Section 51 of the Act, to approve a plan of subdivision. 2. Section 50 of the Condominium Act, to approve or exempt a condominium description. O. Reg. 477/00, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. The authority of the Minister under the following provisions is delegated to the Frontenac Management Board with respect to all applications made on or after August 28, 2000 for land situate in the geographic area of the board:

1. Section 51 of the Act, to approve a plan of subdivision.

2. Section 50 of the Condominium Act, to approve or exempt a condominium description. O. Reg. 477/00, s. 1.

content.content: 2. (1) Despite section 1, all authority of the Minister under section 51 of the Act to approve a plan of subdivision is delegated to the Frontenac Management Board with respect to applications whose file numbers are set out in Schedule 1. O. Reg. 477/00, s. 2 (1). (2) Despite section 1, all authority of the Minister under section 50 of the Condominium Act is delegated to the Frontenac Management Board with respect to applications whose file numbers are set out in Schedule 2. O. Reg. 477/00, s. 2 (2).
content.raw_html:
2. (1) Despite section 1, all authority of the Minister under section 51 of the Act to approve a plan of subdivision is delegated to the Frontenac Management Board with respect to applications whose file numbers are set out in Schedule 1. O. Reg. 477/00, s. 2 (1).

(2) Despite section 1, all authority of the Minister under section 50 of the Condominium Act is delegated to the Frontenac Management Board with respect to applications whose file numbers are set out in Schedule 2. O. Reg. 477/00, s. 2 (2).

content.content: 3. (1) If any authority delegated under section 1 or 2 is in turn delegated to a committee of the Frontenac Management Board or to an appointed officer under subsection 5 (1) of the Act, the Frontenac Management Board shall forward to the Minister a certified copy of the delegating by-law within 15 days of its passing. O. Reg. 477/00, s. 3 (1). (2) The delegations of authority set out in this Regulation are not terminated by reason only that the condition set out in subsection (1) is not complied with. O. Reg. 477/00, s. 3 (2).
content.raw_html:
3. (1) If any authority delegated under section 1 or 2 is in turn delegated to a committee of the Frontenac Management Board or to an appointed officer under subsection 5 (1) of the Act, the Frontenac Management Board shall forward to the Minister a certified copy of the delegating by-law within 15 days of its passing. O. Reg. 477/00, s. 3 (1).

(2) The delegations of authority set out in this Regulation are not terminated by reason only that the condition set out in subsection (1) is not complied with. O. Reg. 477/00, s. 3 (2).

content.content: 4. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 477/00, s. 4. SCHEDULE 1 10T-79090 10T-87007 10T-90009 10T-91002 10T-93006 10T-97004 O. Reg. 477/00, Sched. 1. SCHEDULE 2 10CD-96001 O. Reg. 477/00, Sched. 2.
content.raw_html:
4. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 477/00, s. 4.
